I also like that I can write notes. Finally figured out how to save them and find them. Directions could be a little clearer. Thanks so much for a pretty simple and cute app. I love the 🐻 bear.
Easy succinct and perfect to keep a daily tab on weight! I love it!
Simple and easy way to track weight daily.
So easy to use! Very useful. I've been using it everyday.

Awesome app. However, I do not have the capacity to delete all previous data and need to be able to clear the previous starting weight as it is not correct. Please fix this and I'll gladly give the app 5 stars!

title: Diabetes & Diet Tracker
description:
MyNetDiary’s Diabetes & Diet Tracker app is the easiest and most comprehensive diabetes tracker app for Android.  MyNetDiary can help you better understand and control diabetes and pre-diabetes - along with improving your diet, losing weight and providing feedback, support and motivation.
 
MyNetDiary was featured in the Consumer Guide of Diabetes Forecast magazine, published by the American Diabetes Association, the world’s most trusted source of diabetes information. 

Designed for diabetes type 1, type 2, pre-diabetes and gestational diabetes.

This app helps you understand and control all aspects of diabetes. It shows you the “big picture” of your blood glucose factors by counting carbs in the food you eat, recording medication intake, exercise and everything else you want to capture about your condition.

The app coaches you on losing weight and staying fit. You will learn to eat better and become more active with app tips. The app reveals what really affects your blood glucose when you start changing your lifestyle. We hope your diabetes management story will be a success empowered by our tracker.

Our efficacy study based on self-reported MyNetDiary user data has shown that an active user loses 12% of body weight. Average A1C reduction is 1.4%.

MyNetDiary follows evidence-based guidelines and was ranked #1 diet app by an independent study published in the American Journal of Preventive Medicine. MyNetDiary was featured on NBC, NPR, Lifetime's The Balancing Act, USA Today, Wall Street Journal and Health Magazine.

▌ ESSENTIAL TOOLS FOR YOUR DIABETES & DIET MANAGEMENT
✓ Comprehensive blood glucose tracking with flexible pre-and post-meal target ranges. The app highlights out-of-range readings. Label your readings and understand root causes of BG excursions.
✓ Quick food logging takes only a few minutes a day. Meal reminders help you track consistently. Barcode scanner and instant food search make it fun.
✓ Optional insulin and medication tracking.
✓ Track lab results including A1C, cholesterol, blood pressure and heart rate.
✓ Diet planning for weight loss and maintenance. The app helps you set a realistic weight goal and lose weight in a steady, comfortable fashion.  It keeps analyzing your diary and provides personalized diet tips, it’s like having a virtual coach in your pocket.
✓ Carb counting and nutrition tracking uses a catalog of 805,000 verified foods, updated daily.
If a food is not in the catalog, send us its photos from the app and we will add the food for you, we call it “PhotoFood service”. 
✓ The app starts showing matching foods as you type food name or brand. Food Score helps you understand food labels at a glance.
✓ Net carbs or diabetes carb count for every meal and day
✓ Exercise tracking: log manually or link your diary with Fitbit*, Withings* and Garmin*.
✓ Track your water intake and all body measurements
✓ Custom trackers - track anything you want, such as quality of sleep, symptoms, and more.
✓ Detailed daily and weekly analysis, a comprehensive set of charts and reports helping you understand blood glucose, food, nutrition, weight loss, carb counting and diet management.
✓ Automatic sync to MyNetDiary.com for backup and access from all of your devices. 
✓ App screens are custom-tailored for tablets and phones.

* Advanced features require Premium subscription 

▌DISCLAIMER
This app is an educational tool, it is not a medical device, it is not a substitute for a medical device or medical care, and it does not provide diagnosis, cure, mitigation, treatment, or prevention of any disease. If you have questions or concerns about individual health matters or management of your conditions, please consult your healthcare team.

recentChanges: Accelerate your weight-loss with Premium Diets - plan and track net carbs, get special premium recipes, articles library, diet advice and guidance from the virtual coach, and all of the Premium tools in MyNetDiary.
comments: Easy to use once you get used to it. They offer a significant discount for a one time purchase charge for diabetics $9.99, however, they don't allow online access to the diabetic data through graphs, PDFs, or Excel files without subscribing to a paid plan $60.00 annual charge or more for subscribing monthly.
great app. very easy to use. love the reminders.
I got this App to help count my Carbs. But I am finding I am also loosing some much unwanted waight.

I have the Diabetes & Diet Tracker, and it is very easy to use. I record all my food every day, and the app is very helpful for me personally. Weight loss is made more difficult when you have a ton of emotional baggage like I have. Having the facts - the actual numbers - in front of me helps me stay on track. I also must mention the scanner. It is wonderful!

App works great. Fairly easy to learn and use. Would be 5 stars if it showed a total daily macros on a pie chart instead of a huge layout form that is very difficult to read and quite useless. Like the diabetes carb count, that is most useful to me. Would also like to know how to delete self created recipes but help section isn't very helpful and doesn't explain how. Love the huge database with many foods I use and happy with how easy and quick it is to add the odd new food that isn't there.

title: ProLon: Fasting Mimicking Diet
description:
ProLon has updated the latest app using mimik technology’s authentication services to further secure the protection of your personal data. As part of this update, you will be asked to download an additional package; edgeSDK.

Have you decided to try ProLon®, the first meal program of its kind that mimics the protective and rejuvenating effects of water only fasting?

ProLon is the only Fasting Mimicking Diet® (FMD®) based on the research done at the Longevity Institute at the University of Southern California. It is a 5-day, plant-based meal program that mimics the beneficial effects of fasting while still providing the body with healthy micro and macronutrients. The diet includes soups, crackers, bars, drinks and supplements, all designed to facilitate healthy changes.

When you use the ProLon app, you’ll get helpful information about fasting, support throughout the 5-day fast, and also valuable resources and tools for the weeks between your fasts. Track your progress before and after you complete multiple ProLon cycles in the app.

Change your health one day at a time with the ProLon app!

recentChanges: Fixed PDF Export and more Improvements.
comments: Have been using the app for over two years and does exactly what I want. Was using the free version and had a problem with the database due to changing from imperial to metric units (and changing back again). Emailed support and they had fixed the database for me within 24 hours. Decided to purchase to remove the adds as a thank you. Great service.

The app itself is quite useful as a simple tracker, but the ads are obnoxious. Also, I swiched it at some point from kilograms to pounds, and it really messed up the conversion. (It converted my kg to lb - so 50 kg becomes 110lb - then called those kg, so that that was originally 50kg became 110kg, or 240lb. Didn't do the same when switching back, however. So my now 240lb converted back to 110kg. For my entire history.)

When I switched to a new phone today, I lost my entire log history. This app doesn't let u sign in with an email so it can save data. I tried exporting it, but the file I chose didn't have enough space. So I tried to export it somewhere else but it won't let me switch it to a different location. All my other app's data saved effortlessly because I just signed back in. Very frustrating.
I have never chosen a better app than this one. It simple yet can be complex. I like the color display. All the other features I don't need for now, but be able to activate them when needed.

It was fine until I changed the settings from lbs to kg & it converted the values incorrectly. When I switched back to lb, it doubled the original value which was in lb, so now all of my previous years of data are double what they should be.

title: 5:2 Fast Diet Tracker
descriptionHTML:
5:2 Fast Diet Tracker is an app that will help you organize your diet more easily. With it you can configure your 5:2 diet, set up reminders for meal times, as well as track your progress by entering your weight regularly.

The 5:2 Diet is not only a quick and easy way to lose excess weight but to also start eating healthier without giving up your favorite treats. According to the author of the diet, doctor Michael Mosley, following this diet prolongs life expectancy and reduces the risk of a number of diseases.

Keywords: 5:2 diet, the fast diet, fasting, alternate day fasting, intermittent diet, five two diet

Key Features:
★ personal diet configuration;
★ dynamic recommended calorie intake count per day, based on weight, age, and physical activity;
★ calories tracker;
★ measures tracker;
★ contains basic information about the diet, as well as advice on what to eat during "fast" days;
★ set up reminders for meal times;
★ BMI calculation for each log;
summary: 5:2 Tracker keeps you up-to-date and helps you organize your 5:2 diet with ease.
developerAddress: Bulgaria, Lovech, Treti mart, 34a
recentChanges:
Improvements:
Calories counter: The calories slider is replaced with input in that way logging should be more easy.
The issue with inability to log calories for current day is fixed.
Few more minor bugs are fixed.
comments: I love the tracking of data for THAT day but really miss the ability to see movement from day to day and presumably week to week and month to month. Personally I want to see the movement. Additionally I would like to see a 'snack after dinner' meal added to the calendar. As others have also said it is inconvenient to have to use other sources to calculate the number of calories in every item on foot/drink.

I love the idea, love the design. However, it's full of bugs and almost useless because of it. :'( I tried to enter calories for a day, and it switched to the day before or two days before. When I tried to delete the mistake, it would not delete with the "x" button as expected, even though I tried several times. So disappointed, I really liked how it looked when I first opened it!!! All other calorie counter apps require the same calorie input every day.

Good with reservations I like the simplicity of the app however there are odd glitches. For example, I enter my height as 5 ft 6 ins, and the app changes it to 5ft 5ins no matter how many times I amend it. It also amends the weight entry. I would like to be able to pay a small amount to get rid of ads (if that's an option I haven't found it) and a visual representation of weight loss would be a nice touch.

I found the app easy to use. The only fault for me is when I put my weight in it changes to just below or just above what I have put in. It's only by an oz but its still annoying. Otherwise its great for keeping on track.
It helped me easily achieve my target rate. I logged my calories and weight over a number of weeks and will continue to use this to maintain my ideal weight.

title: Vegetarian Diet Plan
description:
The vegan diet is an eating plan that eliminates all animal products, including meat, fish, eggs, dairy, and honey.

People decide to adopt veganism for different reasons, such as ethical concerns or religious principles.

Others may decide to become vegan to decrease their ecological footprint, as plant-based diets are thought to generate fewer greenhouse gas emissions and use fewer natural resources.

Still, the environmental impact of any diet depends on multiple factors, including the way that foods are produced, packaged, and transported.

Some also decide to follow a vegan diet for health reasons, as veganism is associated with a multitude of benefits and may even help prevent certain chronic diseases.

In particular, vegan diets have been shown to improve heart health, increase weight loss, and support blood sugar control.

SUMMARY
Vegan diets eliminate all animal products, including meat and dairy. People may adopt veganism for ethical, religious, environmental, or health reasons.

Features of Vegan Diet Plan:
~ What Is Vegan Diet
~ Health Benefits
~ Potential Downsides
~ Foods To Eat
~ Foods To Avoid
~ Bottom Line
~ Vegan Meal Plan 7 Days
~ Apps Info

title: Type 2 Diabetes Diet Plan
description:
Type 2 diabetes diet app is simple and easy to use. A Type 2 Diabetic diet usually involves replacing simple carbohydrates with complex carbohydrates and processed foods with nutrient-rich fruits and vegetables. It is created to balance blood glucose levels and reduce the symptoms of diabetes or the on-set of diabetes for the pre-diabetic. A diabetes diet is sometimes referred to as medical nutrition therapy (MNT). You can create a Type 2 diabetic diet plan by following these guidelines.

title: The Blood Type Diet®
description:
Dr. Peter J. D'Adamo's Blood Type Diet® App for Android phones and tablets lists Beneficial, Neutral, and Avoid foods for each of the 4 blood types. It also includes Unknown for those foods not determined.
Handy for grocery shopping, eating in restaurants, and meal planning. On the go or at home, you can always be sure that you are eating right for your type.
Easy to use. Just select your blood type and start picking foods for your type categorized in the handy Food List. Know your secretor status or want to learn more about it? It's an option in the app.

Ours is the only official and approved Blood Type Diet® App for the Android. It's a great way to keep the Blood Type Diet® at your fingertips - a quick, concise and easy reference.

Includes:
Blood Type and optional Secretor Status selection
Food Lists
Shopping List - choose your own or combine family list for multiple blood types
Email Shopping List directly from the app
Family Food List - combine common foods for multiple blood types
Information about each Blood Type

descriptionHTML:
Dr. Peter J. D'Adamo's Blood Type Diet® App for Android phones and tablets lists Beneficial, Neutral, and Avoid foods for each of the 4 blood types. It also includes Unknown for those foods not determined.
Handy for grocery shopping, eating in restaurants, and meal planning. On the go or at home, you can always be sure that you are eating right for your type.
Easy to use. Just select your blood type and start picking foods for your type categorized in the handy Food List. Know your secretor status or want to learn more about it? It's an option in the app.

Ours is the only official and approved Blood Type Diet® App for the Android. It's a great way to keep the Blood Type Diet® at your fingertips - a quick, concise and easy reference.

Includes:
Blood Type and optional Secretor Status selection
Food Lists
Shopping List - choose your own or combine family list for multiple blood types
Email Shopping List directly from the app
Family Food List - combine common foods for multiple blood types
Information about each Blood Type
Updated User Guide
Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
Food Search
Intuitive icons for easier identification and navigation
Convenient Recipe Access (Note: Internet connection required)

Improved the app screens, making better use of how they display on larger devices

title: INDIAN DIET PLANS(हिंदी में)
description:
‘INDIAN DIET PLANS(हिंदी में)’ ऐप लोगों को उनके स्वास्थ्य, इच्छा और कमजोरी के लिए एक राज्य के रूप में उचित आहार और पोषण प्राप्त करने में मदद करने के लिए है। अधिकांश लोग आकार या फिट होने के लिए प्रासंगिक आहार नहीं पा सकते हैं। और इस ऐप के द्वारा, आप निश्चित रूप से फिट होने का आनंद लेंगे !!

इस ऐप में विभिन्न प्रकार के आहार योजनाएं शामिल हैं: -

- वेट गेन डाइट प्लान
- वजन घटाने आहार योजना
- मोटापा आहार
- एसिडिटी के लिए डाइट प्लान
- उच्च यूरिक एसिड आहार योजना
- डायबिटीज/शुगर  के लिए डाइट प्लान
- पीसीओडी के लिए आहार योजना
- उच्च रक्तचाप के लिए आहार योजना
- रमजान के लिए आहार योजना
- डिटॉक्स रेसिपी
- लूज स्टूल और उल्टी के लिए आहार योजना

इस एप्लिकेशन में प्रदान की गई जानकारी उपयोगकर्ताओं की सुविधा के लिए नियमित आधार पर अपडेट की जाएगी।

title: Low Fat Diet App
description:
Enjoy delicious and healthy low fat recipes free with our low fat diet app.

A low fat diet is one that limits the intake of fat and cholesterol. Low fat diets help in reducing the occurrence of conditions such as heart issues and obesity. The diet is also an effective way to reduce weight.

The low fat diet app offers a healthy lifestyle diet through a diverse selection of healthy low fat recipes. It has a variety of low fat recipes free that can be followed for a healthy fitness diet plan. A low fat diet app is a place where you can find healthy fitness recipes.

The low fat diet app has got plenty of easy low fat meal recipes. You can download favorite low fat recipes free to create an offline collection of healthy fitness diet recipe offline. Try your hands on the special low fat low carb diet recipes.

We designed the low fat app with features like:-
 - Choose your favorite low fat low carb diet from low fat food list collections.
 - Best low fat recipes free.
 - Make and send the low fat meal planner shopping list to your partner.
 - Share a Tasty low fat cooking recipe to friends.
 - Get a low fat diet plan without the internet. (No internet required)
 - Tasty low fat food recipe finder by low fat food tracker.
 - Get the best low fat recipes free from around the world.
 - Get healthy recipes for heart free.
 - Low-calorie diet and a high protein diet for a healthy lifestyle.

The low fat diet app is a unique platform for you to search for a low fat low carb diet & low fat calorie diet. low fat app can also be used as a fitness diet cookbook where you can save your tasty low fat low carb diet. 

Some of the low fat recipes free categories:-
 > Healthy breakfast recipes
 > Less calorie chicken recipes
 > less cholesterol recipes
 > Healthy snacks recipes
 > Delicious slow cooker recipes
 > Special fitness soup recipes
 > Less calorie veg recipe
 > Less calorie vegan recipe
 > Healthy vegetarian recipes

Download the low fat diet app today and Enjoy making healthy low fat recipes free.

title: GM Diet Plan
description:
GM diet plan is a diet that restricts your weekly eating routine to certain food groups and helps you lose a substantial amount of weight within just a week.

Sounds perfect right? Well, any diet plan that claims to lose weight in a short period of time becomes popular and so did GM diet plan.

This diet mainly consists of raw fruits and vegetables. The number of meat servings is reduced in this diet. Hence, Veg GM Diet is quite popular.

The GM diet and it’s unique diet plan help your to reduce close to 10-17 lbs in 7 days.

Reducing weight is the primary goal, additionally with reduced weight comes the added benefit of feeling good, looking good all translating to a great experience. Not only does it improve the mental state and attitude of the person following the diet course, it also help you to cleanse and detoxify your body. Infact quite a few people follow the diet once every 6 months to cleanse and detoxify primarily rather that weight loss.

More Feature;
# The GM diet plan
# Benefits & Pros of GM diet
# Side effect & Cons of GM diet
# GM Diet meal plan 7 day 
# Do's & Dont's for faster weight loss
# Goal tracker
# BMI Calculator
# Calorie Calculator
# Take notes
# Apps Info

Feedback:-
If you have any suggested features or improvement, please leave a comment. In case something is not working correctly please let me know. When posting low rating please describe what is wrong to give the possibility to fix that issue.

Ads--
There are ads in this app. Images for this app are stored on the internet and this costs money. application is free, it does not promote paid version of this app, the only way to support future development is to include ads. Please treat that with understanding.

title: Low Carb Indian Diet Plan
description:
This App for weight loss diet plan follows the Low Carb diet guidelines. It’s dairy-free and the vast majority of recipes are sweetener- free (sweeteners are optional).

Low carbs need to be smart carbs. Lucky for us, nature has given us the nutritious, delicious sweet potato. This super food gives all the benefits of other high energy foods with more nutrition and without spiking blood sugar. Plus, this humble tuber tastes great and is easily incorporated into your diet in seriously good ways.

✡  ✡   Features  ✡ ✡

➺  Daily Meal Plan of Low Carb Diet
➺  Which Foods You Should Intake and Which not.
➺  Full Shopping List of Product Which is Necessary For The Low Carb Diet Plan
➺  Benefits and Non-Benefits of Low Carb Diet
➺  Advantages and Side Effects of The Low Carb Diet.
➺  How Low Carb Diet Works to your Body and How You Can Follow This Diet .

title: Fitpaa - Weight Loss, Weight Gain & Home workouts
description:
Our Dream
We have a dream where every single person in our world (Our fathers, mothers, brothers, sisters, children, relatives, life partners and friends) stays fit, looks good, feels confident and experiences their lives with total joy for a maximum possible time. Everything we do at Fitpaa, we do to fulfill this dream. We believe nothing is impossible. With Fitpaa we will help you get and stay fit by providing you holistic personalized health and fitness coaching and provide you all the necessary tools that are required to stay fit. If creating a world in which you and all your loved ones staying fit and healthy inspires you, we would love having you on our side at Fitpaa. Fitpaa can be accessed @ fitpaa.app/welcome
How it works?
✔️Select your health & fitness goal
✔️Your personal trainer will come up with best workout and diet plan
✔️Your personal trainer will help you follow the plan every single day
✔️Consistently complete your daily tasks using the tools provided by your trainer
✔️Achieve your health & fitness goal in 12 weeks
✔️Repeat to stay fit and healthy at every point of your life 

We are specialized in helping you achieve the following goals
★Fit & Healthy
★Weight Loss 
★Weight Gain 
★Increase Flexibility
★Diabetes Control
★Hypertension Control
★Cardiovascular Fitness
★Functional Fitness
★Six Pack Abs
★Shape & Tone
★Obesity Control
★Sleep Better
★Bone Strength
★Sports Fitness
★PCOS Control
★Thyroid Control
★ Bodybuilding

Key features
▶Personalized Workout and Diet plans to achieve your health and fitness goal
▶Get your personalized Fit and healthy food delivered to your doorsteps
▶Personal Fitness trainer at home
▶Fitness assessments
▶1000+ Home and Gym Workouts
▶Workout Tracker
▶North and South Indian Diet Plans
▶Water Tracker
▶ Bodybuilding, yoga, weight loss diet
▶ Water drinking reminder
▶Analyse your past workouts
▶State of the art workout navigation experience
▶Analyze goal progress
▶Body metrics tracking and analysis
▶Reminders
▶Trains both Men & Women
▶Exercises and workouts that never gets you bored
▶Live fitness sessions
▶Video call based personal fitness training sessions


Home & Gym Workout Options
1000+ workout options (1000+ exercises) to choose from every day. They can be done anywhere you prefer either at Home or Gym, with or without equipment

✔ Full body stamina
✔ Full body foundation
✔ Full body strength
✔ Yoga
✔ Aerobic exercises
✔ Cardio exercises
✔ Kicks & Punches
✔ Biceps
✔ Triceps
✔ Back
✔ Legs
✔ Ab Exercises
✔ Chest Workout
✔ Shoulder
✔ Health Tips
✔ Any body parts combination Ex {Back, Biceps} or {Triceps, Chest, abs} etc.
✔ 10, 20 & 30 minute workouts
✔ Fitness Tracking

Usage
▶Start by selecting your plan & setting up your profile (current weight, height & age) in Fit paa
▶Your trainer will assess your metrics and come up with exciting water, workout & diet targets for you every day on fit paa
▶Consistently complete your daily tasks & accomplish your goal with fit paa
▶Regularly log your body vitals including weight, body fat percentage, lean body mass, BMI value, BMI category, heart rate, blood pressure, fasting glucose, random glucose, sleep duration, bone mineral density, T3, T4 & TSH. Your trainer will provide you valuable insights on these vitals and your plan will be adjusted by your trainer consistently based on your progress and vitals on Fit paa

Feedback
Kindly provide your valuable feedback & share fitpaa with your loved ones who believe nothing is impossible and who want to get fit, look good, feel confident and want to achieve their every dream. Fitpaa trainers are passionately looking for opportunities to help you and your loved ones get fit, stay fit and become part of your fight for a 100 year joyful life

title: ওজন কমানোর সহজ উপায় ও ডায়েট চার্ট - Diet Plan
description:
ওজন কমানোর ডায়েট চার্ট অ্যাপটি নিয়ে এবার হাজির হয়েছি আমরা। নিজের বাড়তি ওজন নিয়ে যারা টেনশন এ আছেন তাদের জন্যই কিছু পরিমিত ডায়েট প্ল্যান দেয়া হয়েছে এখানে। সাথে রয়েছে নির্দিষ্ট সময়ে নির্দিষ্ট পরিমান ওজন কমানোর কিছু দারুন ডায়েট চার্ট। ওজন কমানোর সহজ উপায় হিসেবে অ্যাপটি আপনাদের দারুন সাহায্য করবে বলেই আমাদের বিশ্বাস।
বাড়তি ওজনের পেছনেই জীবন যায়- এমন মানুষ আছেন অনেক। চেষ্টাও করেছেন; কিন্তু কমেনি। আসলে নিয়মমতো খাওয়াদাওয়া, হাঁটাচলা হয়নি। তাই যাঁরা হাল ছেড়ে দিয়ে বসে আছেন তাঁদের জন্য এই ক্ষুদ্র প্রচেষ্টা। অল্প সময়ে ওজন কমিয়ে তারপর ব্যালেন্স ডায়েটের মাধ্যমে কাঙ্ক্ষিত ওজন ধরে রাখতে পারলেই কেবল ক্র্যাশ ডায়েটের পরামর্শ দেওয়া হয়। তবে সেটা সবার জন্যই ভালো কাজে দেয়না। আদর্শ ডায়েট চার্ট কিংবা ডায়েট করার নিয়ম জানলেই হয় না, বরং ওজন কমানোর ব্যায়াম গুলোও কিছুটা জানা দরকার। ওজন কমানোর উপায় বলতে তাই শুধু ডায়েট কন্ট্রোল নয়, সাথে সাথে ব্যায়াম করাটাও জরুরি। মেয়েদের ডায়েট চার্ট ছেলেদের থেকে কিছুটা আলাদা, তাই তাদের জন্যও বিশেষ একটা ডায়েট চার্ট দেয়া হয়েছে।

Weight Loss Diet Chart is the app that are appeared with some exclusive diet plan. This app consists of some modest diet plans for those who are in tension over their weight. There are also some excellent diet charts for certain weight loss at specific times. We believe this app will help you as an easy way to lose weight. Diet plan weight loss is just a step of loosing your extra weight. Diet chart bangla is for that people who is interested to loose their weight.

There is a lot of people who are living behind excess weight. Have tried hard but it did not happen. Crash diet is recommended only after decreasing the weight and then keeping the desired weight through balance diet. But it does not work well for everyone. Regardless of the norms of diet charts or diet, we also need to know some of the weight loss exercises too. To say weight loss is not just diet control, but it is also important to exercise. Girls' diet charts are somewhat different from boys, so they have been given a special diet chart.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ertapps.weight_reducing_tips_diet_chart

title: Glycemic Index Load in food net carbs diet tracker
description:
Glycemic Index & Load Diet Assistant is an app that lets you easily browse, search for, and display the Glycemic Index for different foods. The application also helps in keeping a body weight and blood glucose levels measurement logs. It also allows to track blood pressure and warns about too high levels of tension. You can also browse Glycemic Load and carbohydrates contents in foods. There's also a calculator of the Glycemic Load in a given serving. Knowing these values and following a low-carb diet like Montignac, Paleo, Atkins, low-GI and similar, helps avoid weight gain or obesity and lower the risk of diabetes, coronary heart and age-related health diseases.

Do you want to eat smart?

+ know good food
+ eat smart
+ follow low-carb diets or keto diets
+ control your weight
+ prevent diseases like diabetes or heart diseases like hypertension
+ fight weight gain, overweight and obesity
+ have the Glycemic Load, Index and carbs data always at hand
+ backup or sync with other devices

The free features of the app are:

+ Glycemic Index foods tables
+ Favorite and recent food + search feature
+ Weight tracking with statistics and beautiful charts
+ Glucose tracking with statistics and beautiful charts
+ Blood pressure diary with statistics and beautiful charts
+ BMI calculator

We keep this app free by showing ads. If you want to remove ads or utilize the other exciting features like below, you can have them for a small fee. 

+ Glycemic Load list
+ Carbohydrates content list
+ Fiber content in foods and net carbs calculator
+ Meal content calculator
+ Food diary to keep track of your food, glycemic load and carbs consumption
+ Statistics with averages for daily, weekly, monthly and yearly periods
+ Beautiful charts of the GL and carbs consumption over time
+ Weight tracking with statistics and beautiful charts
+ Unlimited number of measurements
+ Future additions to the food tracker, charting and stats
+ Import/export all your data to/from cloud storage
+ No more ads!

So, do you know what you eat? Find out now! Install the app and use it to take control of your health.

GI means Glycemic Index. It is a number associated with a particular type of food to indicate the food's effect on a person's blood glucose (blood sugar) level. The number typically ranges between 50 and 100, where 100 represents pure glucose, an equivalent amount of pure glucose.

The Glycemic Load (GL) of food is a number that estimates how much the food will raise a person's blood glucose level after eating it. It can be used to apply the Glycemic Index to dieting by connecting the GI number with carbohydrates content in a given serving. It gives an estimation on how much a serving size of food is likely to increase blood-sugar levels.

Net carbs are total carbs minus fiber which is indigestible thus it is considered not to raise blood sugar levels.

BMI is used to assess health risks and body structure but does not take in consideration muscular mass so it can sometimes be inaccurate, for instance in the case of athletes or pregnant women.

Diabetes mellitus (DM), commonly known as diabetes, is a group of metabolic disorders characterized by high blood sugar levels over a prolonged period.

Hyperglycemia (also spelled hyperglycaemia or hyperglycæmia), is a condition in which an excessive amount of glucose circulates in the blood plasma.

Observational studies demonstrate that people who maintain arterial pressures at the low end of these pressure ranges have much better long-term cardiovascular health.

recentChanges:
3.6.0 brings HbA1c value into the glucose tracker and also the following:
* Added averages for the last 7 and 14 measurements to the stats in the weight tracker
* Added fourth level of the glucose classification to the glucose tracker
* Allowed future dates in the food diary
* New tutorial videos for the app:

comments: Very quick and easy app to use. Very handy if you are watching sugar intake (diet, health, both). The free version shows the Glycemic Index of the food item, & it's all colour coded like traffic lights so very quick to scroll or search for the food you want - & see if it's a good choice! For those who want to eat a low-carb lifestyle and also watching the impact of carbs for health reasons, the app now includes the option to make a one time payment to see the Glycemic Load of food. I love it!
This app is in alphabetical order and easy to read. When I have a question about a food that I want to eat I check its glycemic load. I don't use it everyday but when I use it I know it's accurate.
Great Apps, for future ideas, you may use the phone camera, and users can just take a shot on the food, and it will automatically tells GI and GL number. :)
Very helpful and ease of use in identifying glycemic differences among a wide range of foods. Still loving this app.
Easy to use with the new Blood pressure addition completes everything you need all in one app.

title: Diet Plan Weight Loss App
description:
Start cooking these diet recipes for free, with Cookbook's Diet Plan Weight Loss app. Your search for healthy and easy diet recipes ends today. Learn to cook tasty diet-friendly meals from recipe collections of the finest diet recipes in the world. You can download a diet recipes app to create an offline collection of healthy diet recipes to lose weight fast. 

Stay healthy and fit by eating our healthy meals with our diet and exercise app. Find the best diet recipes for weight loss in our weight loss diet plan app. The meal planner for weight loss app contains food for weight loss with healthy carbohydrates, fiber-rich food, fish, and good fats. Count your calorie intake using our calorie counter facility in the meal plan app. 

Discover the diet tracker app that gives you what the other diet apps don’t. The diet tracker app free is your weight tracker, nutrition assistant, diet tracker, and calorie counter. It is also a weight loss recipe app with many weight loss recipes for free. 

We designed the meal planner app with features like:-

1. Choose your favorite recipes from diet food recipes collections.
2. Daily meal planner for weight loss.
3. Diet food recipes for free
4. Make a shopping list for diet-friendly grocery shopping.
5. Send the food recipe shopping list to your partner.
6. Send healthy weight loss recipes to friends.
7. Get food recipes offline without the internet. (No internet required)
8. Find different dieting methods such as keto, paleo, diabetic diet, and many more.  
9. Weight loss diet recipes search by ingredients, dietary preferences, cooking difficulty, etc.
10. Get popular meal plans for weight loss from around the world.
11. Find the best meal planner to plan meals to hit your targets.
12. Track your calories using the fastest calorie counter to lose weight.
13. Find the best diet tracker feature in the diet apps free. 


Healthy weight loss recipe categories:-
> Keto diet categories
> Diabetic diet recipes
> Weight loss diet plan for men & women
> Paleo diet meal plan
> Vegan meal plan for weight loss
> Mediterranean diet recipes
> Dash diet meal planner
> Healthy weight loss recipes for free

Our diet plan weight loss app focuses on:-
+ Healthy carbs like fruits, vegetables, whole grains, legumes (beans/peas), and low-fat dairy (milk/cheese).
+ Lose weight food recipes like salads, green smoothies, vegan recipes, etc.
+ Good fats like avocado, nuts, canola oil, olive oil, and peanut oil.
+ Plan meals with meal planner to hit your targets.
+ Calories trackers to track your calorie intake. 

We designed the diet apps for men & women to help answer your various diet-related questions. The diet and exercise app's calorie counter helps to measure calorie intake. The app is also a suitable diet app for kids’ weight loss. 

Download this free weight loss tracker app today and get started on your weight loss diet plan. Enjoy the best diet recipes app.

title: Zero Calories Fasting Tracker & Intermittent Fast
description:
Intermittent Fasting Tracker. 
Zero Calories - Fasting Tracker & Intermittent Fast is a very light and simple health and fasting timer app. It allows users to modify fasting time and length of the fast, track body weight, body measures, ketones, glucose and body fat.
Diet assistant 
Zero Calories will help you stay on track, remind you to start your fasting and give you suggestions for improve body weight. There are plenty of features that will motivate you to stay on track.
Intermittent Fasting Plans 
There are more intermittent fasting to choose. Advance, beginner, keto, vegan, muscle builder or other. Zero calories can create a custom fasting plan.
Social Intermittent Fasting 
Join our public groups, chat with other fasters and friends. 
Share each other progress and motivation.

Zero Calories tracks what is happening inside your body white fasting. 
We will teach you how and why your body burns fat. 
Zero Calories is your private health and  diet coach.
You can also use group fasting for fast with your friends.

Fasting is an easy diet that do not require much effort. Just follow the timer and do not consume food in the fasting period (Except the food with zero calories). 

After your fasting is over, feel free to consume any food you like. 
However, healthy whole food is always a better choice then processed fast food. 

Main features:

✔ Track fast time
✔ Edit start time
✔ Edit end time
✔ Track weight
✔ Water Tracker 
✔ BMI Tracker
✔ Widget for track time
✔ Compare weight to fast time
✔ Track body measures
✔  Export data to csv
✔ Set notifications for start fast
✔ Set notifications for end fast
✔ Create custom fast time
✔ Create prolonged fasts (up to 40 days)
✔ Sync data with web
✔ Print fast data and weight loss from web
✔ Track ketones
✔ Track glucose
✔ Track body fat
✔ Fast with friends
Intermittent fasting benefits:

✔ CELL REPAIR

During a fast, your body will rid of waste materials inside the cells and dead cells themselves while repairing and rebuilding new stronger cells. 

✔ LONGEVITY AND DISEASE PREVENTION

Gene expression is something that happens where your body experiences changes in genes, cells and molecules directly related to life span and disease prevention.

✔ INSULIN LEVELS

Fasting can help improve insulin sensitivity, which has been shown to help lose more body fat and/or store less body fat from the food taken in.

✔ GROWTH HORMONE BOOST

This can help to regulate body composition, body fluids, muscle and bone growth, sugar and fat metabolism, and possibly heart function. 

✔ TESTOSTERONE

Fasting has been shown to directly bump levels of testosterone in men.

✔ LOSE WEIGHT

All of the above can already help you lose body fat and drop some pounds. But one of the biggest drivers in intermittent fasting that is leading to weight loss is the fact that it’s easier to adhere to a caloric deficit on a daily basis.

✔ METABOLISM INCREASES

Due to the bodies natural hormonal boosts, insulin improvement and survival mechanisms, your metabolism can actually bump up and become faster due to intermittent fasting. 

✔ STRESS AND INFLAMMATION

Intermittent fasting was shown to help improve oxidative stress and inflammation in the body. 

✔ HEART HEALTHY

Some studies were done showing that intermittent fasting may actually help improve cholesterol, triglycerides, blood pressure, and inflammatory markers.

✔ CANCER PREVENTION

Fasting has been shown to help in the regeneration of cells which could be a possible aid in preventing or helping manage cancer.

✔ GUT HEALTH

Intermittent fasting has been shown to help aid the GI tract in digestion and also protect your gut bacteria, both due to the anti-inflammatory benefits of fasting.

Our Website : https://zerocaloriesfasting.com

developerAddress: Istarskog razvoda 10
recentChanges: Fixed premium cloud issue
comments: Postive: Good to track intermittent fasting hours. Keeps you honest and its good to have a visual countdown. You can also set your own personal goal eg 13hrs. Negative: Can be hard to navigate. LOTS of ads, which are frustrating, including asking me to rate the app. My response to your reply (copied below) is: My point is it's frustrating that you can't use the app without responding to your review requests. Your response to my feedback - you ask me to increase my rating of your app to 5 stars. I've now decreased it. Your reply - Hi Carolyn, the ads keep the app free, but you can remove them for a extra small amount (one cup of coffee). Also by rating the app, you help us to acquire more users which can increase our budget for new free cool features :D If you can consider to give us a 5 star review, could be awesome, thanks. My point is it's frustrating that you can't use the app without loads of ads and responding to your review requests. Your response... you ask me to increase my rating of your app to 5stars.

A bit heavy on the ads, but I do expect ads on the free version. Otherwise, this app has everything I've been looking for for fasting tracking. Love that it let's me track all my measurements along with weight. Can measure glucose and ketone levels if I want. I've been fasting for a while and wanted to find an app that would let me enter old fasts. It could be smoother for allowing this, but it does let me edit times and dates for my fasts so I've been able to enter old fasts. Can customize too!

Easy to log info and clear displays. I like the idea of choice of time counting upward or count down. Developer even replied to my previous rating to explain my mistake. Now gave 5 stars as I've tried others and there's more adverts or have to pay. This app is the best in my opinion.

Not a bad fasting app, but the BMI calculator is wrong. I like that you can track body measurements, but it would be nice if they added a female body. Edit to add- my units are all correct. Looking again, it looks like the app IS showing the right number at the top of the screen, but the graph is showing it 6 units higher
It doesn't freeze up and it tells you what your body is suppose to be doing at certain levels. But, I'm not sure how to share this app with other faster. I've tried and I just don't see it.

title: 1500 Calorie Diet
description:
1500 calorie menu plan is a well balanced and healthy diet plan that will help you to gradually lose weight and keep your body nourished with all necessary nutrients at the same time. Remember, if you want to lose a pound in a week (which is ideal weight loss approach) you need to cut down on about 500 calories a day. So if your daily caloric intake is 2000 calories then to lose a pound per week you need to lower that to 1500 calories and so forth. Before you choose this 1500 calorie menu, make sure it fits your dietary needs. The following healthy diet menu is planned for a week, so you get 7 free 1500 calorie menu plans.

Remember that healthy lifestyle will let you enjoy your life for years to come! So enjoy 1500 calorie diet.

title: Diet Telur Rebus
description:
Diet telur rebus merupakan diet yang berkesan untuk penurunan berat badan tanpa kelaparan. Diet telur rebus mengesyorkan pengambilan 2 – 4 biji telur sehari dalam tempoh diet selama 2 minggu. Diet telur rebus merupakan diet rendah karbohidrat kerana tiada pengambilan nasi, mee, roti, ubi kentang dan sebagainya. 

Selepas 2 minggu mengamalkan diet telur rebus, berat badan dijangka akan menurun sebanyak 11 Kg atau 20 paun. Jumlah penurunan berat badan adalah berbeza bagi setiap individu bergantung kepada faktor-faktor seperti umur, berat asal, keadaan kesihatan dan juga sejarah pemakanan/diet.

Mengapakah telur khas dipilih? Telur mengandungi segala asid amino yang diperlukan oleh badan kita. Ia juga merupakan sumber protein yang paling baik dan sihat berbanding dengan sumber yang lain seperti daging, susu dan soya. Telur mengandungi zat mineral dan vitamin seperti zink, magnesium, fosforus, besi, kalsium, potassium, choline, lecithin, asid folik, selenium, vitamin A, vitamin D, vitamin B2, vitamin B5 dan vitamin E. Sebiji telur (50 g) hanya mengandungi 71 kalori sahaja. Oleh itu, telur baik untuk dimakan untuk cepat kenyang tanpa pengambilan kalori yang tinggi.

Diet telur rebus sangat senang untuk diamalkan.  Resipi yang dicadangkan mudah untuk disediakan dan juga berkhasiat.  Kandungan nutrisi serta jumlah kalori bagi setiap resipi juga disediakan. Resipi yang terdapat di dalam diet ini adalah seperti berikut:

1. Ayam panggang
2. Ayam dan sayur kukus/stim
3. Sos untuk salad (3 jenis)
4. Ikan panggang/bakar oven
5. Telur dadar/omelet
6. Telur rebus
7. Salad sayur
8. Salad tuna atau telur rebus
9. Telur hancur (scrambled eggs)
10. Telur frittata
11. Sup telur
12. Telur masak celur (poached eggs)
13. Telur bakar dalam oven
14. Telur mata kerbau
15. Ayam dan sayur gril/panggang
16. Ikan gril/panggang
17. Ayam masak dalam pan (pan-seared chicken)
18. Telur masak tomato
19. Sup ayam dan sayur
20. Shirataki goreng

 Muat turun aplikasi Diet Telur Rebus hari ini untuk memulakan pemakanan sihat dan menurunkan berat badan secara efektif!

title: Lchf Malayalam
description:
കാര്ബോഹൈഡ്രേറ്റ്സ് (അന്നജം ) അടങ്ങിയ ഭക്ഷണം ഒഴിവാക്കി ഫാറ്റ് ( കൊഴുപ്പ് ) അടങ്ങിയ ഭക്ഷണം സ്ഥിരമാക്കി നമ്മുടെ രോഗങ്ങളെയും രോഗ സാധ്യതയേയും തോൽപ്പിക്കുന്ന ഡയറ്റ് ....ഇത് മൂലം പ്രമേഹം , കോളസ്ട്രോൾ , യൂറിക് ആസിഡ് , തൈറോയിഡ് , പൊണ്ണത്തടി , ഗ്യാസ്‌ട്രബിള് തുടങ്ങി ഒട്ടു മിക്ക രോഗങ്ങളും കുറക്കാൻ കഴിയും.
നമ്മൾ ഇത്രയും കാലം ശരീരത്തിന്റെ ഊർജ്ജത്തിനായി ഗ്ളൂക്കോസ് ആണ് ഉപയോഗിച്ചിരുന്നത്. ഈ ഡയറ്റിൽ ഗ്ളൂക്കോസ് ഇല്ലാത്തതു കാരണം ശരീരം കൊഴുപ്പിനെ ഊർജ്ജമാക്കാനുള്ള ശ്രമത്തിലാണ്. അതിനാൽ ശരീരത്തിലെ കൊഴുപ്പു പെട്ടന്ന് തന്നെ കുറയുകയും പോന്ന തടിയും മറ്റും പെട്ടന്ന് കുറയുന്നു

LCHF Malyalam ആപ്പിൻറ്റെ പ്രത്യേകതകൾ
*റെസിപ്പീസ്- ബ്രേക്ഫാസ്റ്റ്, ബ്രഞ്ച്, സ്നാക്ക്സ്, ലഞ്ച്, ഡിന്നർ, വെജിറ്റേറിയൻ, ഡ്രിങ്ക്സ്, ഈസി മീൽ എനീ ക്യാറ്റഗറികളിലായി വിവിധയിനം റെസിപ്പീസ്
*റെസിപ്പീസ് ആഡ് ട്ടോ ഫേവറൈറ്റ്സ് ചെയ്യാനുള്ള ഓപ്ഷൻ 
 *ന്യൂസ്-Lchf അഥവാ കീറ്റോ ഡയറ്റിനെ കുറിച്ചുള്ള പത്ര മാധ്യമങ്ങളിൽ വരുന്ന വാർത്തകൾ,മറ്റു ആരോഗ്യ വാർത്തകൾ എന്നിവ ഇതിൽ വരുന്നു.
*ചാറ്റ്-ഡയറ്റിനെ കുറിച്ചുളള മാത്രം ചർച്ചകൾക്കായി ഒരു ഓപ്പൺ ചാറ്റ് റൂം സൗകര്യം
*ഗൈഡ് - LCHF ഡയറ്റിനെ സംബന്ധിച്ചുള്ള ഗൈഡ്,ടിപ്സ് എന്നിവ അടങ്ങിയ ഏരിയ.
*സോഷ്യൽ-LCHF ഫേസ്ബുക് പേജ് 
*ഇതിനു പുറമെ ടെലിഗ്രാം,യൂട്യൂബ് ചാനൽ ലിങ്കുകളും ആപ്പിൽ കാണാവുന്നതാണ്
*ഓരോ പുതിയ റെസിപ്പികളും,വാർത്തകളും,പൊടികൈകളും ആഡ് ചെയ്യുമ്പോൾ ഫോണിലേക്കു പുഷ് നോട്ടിഫിക്കേഷൻ വരുന്നതിനുള്ള സൗകര്യവും ഏർപ്പെടുത്തിയിട്ടുണ്ട്

title: DASH Diet Meal Plan & Recipes
description:
This App for weight loss diet plan follows the 7 Day DASH Diet Meal Plan to prevent and lower high blood pressure, which is why it's called the Dietary Approaches to Stop Hypertension. The DASH diet eating plan is a diet rich in fruits, vegetables, low fat or nonfat dairy. It also includes mostly whole grains; lean meats, fish and poultry; nuts and beans. It is high fiber and low to moderate in fat. It is a plan that follows US guidelines for sodium content, along with vitamins and minerals.

What is a good breakfast in Dash Diet Plan for high blood pressure?

Start your day with a breakfast filled with key nutrients known to help with blood pressure. Getting enough potassium is essential, as it lowers blood pressure and counteracts sodium. Whole grains and several phytochemicals fight high blood pressure, or hypertension. Calcium and magnesium are also dietary musts.

What do you eat on the DASH Diet? 

• Eat more fruits, vegetables, and low-fat dairy foods.
• Cut back on foods that are high in saturated fat, cholesterol, and trans fats.
• Eat more whole-grain foods, fish, poultry, and nuts.
• Limit sodium, sweets, sugary drinks, and red meats.

Features of 7 Day DASH Diet Meal Plan App: 

• Dash Diet Plan For Weight Loss
• 1200 Calorie Dash Diet Menu
• Dash Diet Menu PDF
• Dash Diet Shopping List
• Dash Diet Menu Plan Phase 1
• Dash Diet Meal Plan 1600 Calories
• Low Sodium Diet Menu
• High Blood Pressure Menu

Following The DASH Diet

The DASH eating plan shown below is based on 2,000 calories a day. The number of daily servings in a food group may vary from those listed depending on your caloric needs. Use this chart to help you plan your menus or take it with you when you go to the store.

Download https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Avni.DaDietMeal.Recipes Now!!

title: Stupid Simple Paleo Diet Tracking & Guide
description:
Lose weight, gain muscle, and feel empowered about your food choices with Stupid Simple Paleo, the easiest-to-use calories and macros counter for people on the Paleo Diet.

Why eat as the cavemen did? The Paleo Diet emphasizes a return to our natural state with a diet rich with high fiber, unprocessed foods, locally grown produce, and quality antibiotic-free, organic meats. You’ll feel great losing weight and you’ll feel confident about consuming only natural foods.  

FEATURES:
• Easy-to-use food icons for logging your daily Paleo foods.
• Full of Paleo ingredients to inspire creative cooking.
• Barcode scanner that let's you scan food to record it.
• Track your progress over time and set daily goals.
• Sync between devices for free.
• Food bank conserves calories for special events.
• Add custom foods.
• Helpful warnings when you approach your daily carb/fat/protein limit.
• Change portion sizes on the fly.
• Easily review your daily foods.
• Helps you learn new habits, eat right, and ultimately keep the weight off. 
• Track your glasses of water each day

Are you ready for a healthy start? Try it out today - it’s free! You have nothing to lose but the fat.
 
*Brought to you by the developer of Stupid Simple Keto.

recentChanges: Welcome to the all new Stupid Simple Paleo version 6! We've redesigned the app from the ground up, making it faster, more reliable, and easier to use. You can now share your progress and foods with friends and family too. The piggy bank is now a rolling 30 day bank that updates dynamically when you add/remove food in the past OR resets at the beginning of each month. The choice is yours! This minor update fixes an incompatibility with our Macros app.
comments: Great little app that does exactly what it says it does. Easy interface with awesome icons and graphics. It does need calorie expenditure for workouts though. Or at least I haven't found it yet. Still worth every cent for the add free version.

Just amazing! Tried a few apps but this one beats them all. Truly thank the developers. Gives you full control of the breakdown of your diet (% macros) and a tailored goal. Once you add items it automatically deducts from your daily goal so you can plan ahead. Stupid simple indeed. Tip my hat to you guys

Great app. It makes it easy to keep track of what you are eating with barcode scanning and quickly searchable lists of foods. You can carry your own recipes easily and then add them to your day while changing portion size on the fly. It is simple to set the macro balances that you want as well. The only real improvement would be that it would be nice to be able to access a report of your micronutrients as well. Although that isn't as important as easy access to your macro's.

once I figured out how to use the app, it has been amazing. I wish there were step by step directions on what each thing is and how to use it, such as the calorie bank. I was able to find the answer on Google. there is probably still more to this app that I am not aware of. the next question on this asks if we can import recipes. I'm not aware of being able to do that but I will definitely be asking Google

App is basically useless unless you buy the premium version. None of the features work in the "free" version and every time you attempt to use one you're simply prompted with an "upgrade to premium" ad. Don't waste your time downloading this.

title: DEBM - Diet Enak Bahagia Menyenangkan
description:
Anda sudah bosan minum obat pelangsing tapi malah kantong yang langsing, perut tetap gemuk
Sudah bosan menahan lapar tapi malah sakit maag, gak kurus – kurus
Ini dia cara paling gampang turunkan berat badan , hanya dengan mengatur kapan Anda makan sesuatu, hal tersebut dapat menurunkan berat badan
Temukan semuanya dalam APP ini
Aplikasi ini menampilkan panduan makan apa hari ini dan tanya jawab seputar diet yang sehat berdasarkan metode DEBM (Diet Enak Bahagia Menyenangkan)

Hobi makan, impian kurus, tidaklah mustahil!

title: كيتو دايت - keto diet
description:
Keto diet - كيتو دايت

هو تطبيق شامل لنظام الكيتو دايت باللغة العربية 

-التطبيق يحتوي علي العديد من الوصفات التي تساعدك علي الانتظام في الكيتو دايت .
 
-التطبيق يحتوي علي اكثر من فئة من الوجبات (فطار-غداء-عشاء-تحلية).

title: dietgene - DNA Testing, Diet, Recipes & Health App
description:
Ever feel like your diet isn’t really made for you? That’s because it isn’t! Personalize your diet with dietgene. Match your meal planning to personal preferences, genetic background, and your DNA analysis from 23andMe or Ancestry. 
 
Even if you don’t have a DNA test, track your calories, meals, weight, exercise, routines, nutrition, and get custom recipe recommendations for YOUR health every day with dietgene. 
 
How does it work?
1. After launch, dietgene will prompt you to import your 23andMe or Ancestry DNA raw data file.* 
2. Instantly, dietgene will analyze your DNA file to provide you with the optimal diet for you FREE!
3. You will get daily meal recommendations that will help you improve your diet and lose weight.
 
*If you don’t have a DNA (genetic) test, don’t worry, you can still get personalized diet and recipe recommendations according to your preferences and profile answers. You will have the option to manually select either a low-carb, low-fat, or Mediterranean diet to see meal recommendations and manage your nutrient and calorie levels.
 
HEALTHY MEAL PLANNING
-Check dietgene every day to get delicious healthy recipes for breakfast, lunch, & dinner that match your nutrient and calorie goals.
-Filter and browse options based on your DNA results, favorite foods, healthiest options, or most popular meals.
-Track your meal plans, see your diet progress, and get alerts to keep you on your goals and enjoying the latest fresh tastes.
-Analyze your diet choices and food options and get suggestions about your diet, health, and achieving your weight loss goals.
-Manage your heart healthy or diabetic diet plan and discover heart or diabetes-friendly recipes.
 
CALORIE AND NUTRIENT COUNTING
-Based on your biology, dietgene will optimize your calorie and nutrient levels to help you manage your meals and weight loss.
-Detailed recipes and meals with nutritional information is a click away, add your meal and dietgene calculates everything for you.
 
LOG YOUR EXERCISE 
-Sync your Apple Health, Google Fit or FitBit to dietgene and your activity data and basal energy will help optimize your diet plan.
-Compare calories burned from various exercises and track your activity according to a distance log.
-Log your weight and see your progress over time.
 
WE CARE ABOUT YOUR PRIVACY
dietgene ensures that your account and genetic file is secured and encrypted.

title: Atkins Nutrition 🆚 Keto Diet - Weight Watch Guide
description:
Atkins diet and Keto diet are both very popular low carb diets.
With more than 20 short lessons, this diet app we will go in depth to Keto and Atkins diets, you will know exactly why and how each of them works, the pros and the cons and of course you’ll find out which is the best match for you.

The ketogenic diet plan, or keto, is getting the type of buzz that the Atkins Diet created when it first emerged. With both low-carb diet regimens, the suggestion is to reduce weight by cutting carbs while eating more fat than most diet plans or dietary nutrition standards recommended. Since invented, many weight watchers and people that want to lose weight use both diets and has a lot to tell us about the process and the success rate.
🥑 The focus on reduced carbs as well as higher fat is similar, particularly in the first, most-restrictive Atkins phase. In Atkin Phase 1, overall carbohydrates comprise just 10% of calories from everyday dishes. For keto, in general, complete carbohydrates are also reduced at 7% of day-to-day meals.
We check differences and similarities in terms of price/cost, health benefits, weight loss impact and risks
🥑 The Atkins diet, officially called the Atkins Nutritional Plan, is a low-carb diet regimen developed by Robert.  Atkins stated that he made use of the study to fix his own overweight condition. 

🥑 The four stages - There are four stages of the Atkins diet plan: induction, recurring weight-loss, pre-maintenance and also life time upkeep.
Step 1 - Induction - Induction is the most restrictive stage of the Atkins Nutritional Strategy. 2 weeks are suggested for this stage. It is meant to create the body to swiftly get in a state of ketosis. 
Step 2- Continuous weight reduction - The Continuous Fat Burning (OWL) stage of Atkins contains a boost in carb consumption, yet continuing to be at degrees where weight reduction takes place
Step 3 - Pre-maintenance 
Step 4 - Life time 

🥑 Nature of the atkins diet -The Atkins diet regimen involves restricted intake of carbohydrates to change the body's metabolic process from metabolizing sugar as energy over to converting stored body fat to power. This process, called ketosis, starts when insulin degrees are reduced; in regular humans, insulin is most affordable when blood sugar levels are reduced (mainly prior to eating). 

🥑 The ketogenic diet plan (or keto, for short) is a low-carb, high-fat diet plan that provides great deals of health advantages. Actually, over 20 researches expose that this sort of diet regimen plan can assist you reduce weight as well as boost your wellness.
Possible healing uses for the keto diet plan have in fact been checked out for countless additional neurological conditions, a few of which include: Alzheimer's condition, amyotrophic side sclerosis, migraine headache, neurotrauma, discomfort, Parkinson's condition, and also remainder issues. Ketogenic diet plan regimens may even have advantages versus diabetes mellitus, cancer, epilepsy as well as more.

🥑 Learn What Is a Ketogenic Diet plan?

🥑Types of Ketogenic Diet Regimens

🥑 Keto foods to Eat and Non-keto foods to Stay clear of

🥑 Sample meal plan for one day

🥑 Keto calculator – Learn about your statistics and build a custom plan


Are you weight losers / weight watchers? 
Download now!

title: Low Carb Diet
description:
Low - carbohydrate diets or low - carb diets are dietary programs that restrict carbohydrate consumption. Foods high in easily digestible carbohydrates (e.g., sugar, bread, pasta) are limited or replaced with foods containing a higher percentage of fats and moderate protein (e.g., meat, poultry, fish, shellfish, eggs, cheese, nuts, and seeds) and other foods low in carbohydrates (e.g., most salad vegetables such as spinach, kale, chard and collards), although other vegetables and fruits (especially berries) are often allowed. The amount of carbohydrate allowed varies with different low-carbohydrate diets.

Low-carbohydrate diets or low carb diets are nutritional programs that advocate restricted carbohydrate consumption, based on research that ties carbohydrate consumption with increased blood insulin levels, and overexposure to insulin with metabolic syndrome (the most recognized symptom of which is obesity).

Features of Low Carb Diet Plan:
* The Low Carb Diet: A Detailed Beginner's Guide
* Is the LCHF Diet the Same as the Ketogenic Diet or Atkins Diet?
* The LCHF Diet Can help you lose weight
* The LCHF Diet May Benefit a number of Health Conditions
* Foods to Avoid
* Foods To Eat
* How Does the Low Carb Diet Work?
* Why would i want to do Low-Carbohydrate Diet??
* How Many Carbs i need to eat per day??
* Common Misconceptions about Low-Carb Diet!!
* Low Carb Diets Lead to state known as ketosis, which causes harm!!
* All of the weight loss on Low Carb Diets is Water Weight!!
* Side Effects and Downfalls of the diet
* Good Carbohydrates verses Bad Carbohydrates??
* The Low Carb Meal Plan 7 Day
* BMI Calculator
* Goal Tracker
* Calories Calculator
* Apps info

title: دايت كلينيك - رجيم الوزن المثالي
description:
دايت كلينيك هو برنامج رجيم متميز سينال إعجابكِ بمشيئة الله مع متابعة دائمة من د/ أحمد منصور .. أخصائي التغذية العلاجية.

بمجرد وجود دايت كلينيك على هاتفك ستصلك التنبيهات من أخصائي التغذية العلاجية دكتور أحمد منصور، بكل ما يتعلق بالدايت وما يناسبك منهم، ويتابع معكِ أفضل أنواع الرجيم المناسبة لكِ والبرنامج الأفضل والذي قد يصل بكِ لتخسيس 30 كيلو في شهر بإذن الله.

تقييمات مستخدمينا هي التي ساعدتنا على تطوير تطبيق دايت كلينيك من أجل المتابعة المستمرة معكن واختيار أفضل وأسرع وصفات تخسيس الجسم كله بطريقة صحية وفعالة حيث أن الدكتور يختار ويرشح الرجيم المناسب لكل حالة، ويجيب المتابعين عن الأسئلة المتعلقة بالأطفال ومرضى السكر والقلب والمرضعات والحوامل.


مميزات تطبيق دايت كلينيك:

1-  يحتوي على جميع الأقسام التي تهمكِ فيما يتعلق بالتنحيف.
2- قسم الأنظمة الغذائية يضم أحدث وأسرع وصفات التخسيس وأكثرها فعالية لتحقيق الوزن والجسم المثالي المنشود، كما يحتوي نظام رجيم رمضان في الشهر الفضيل ليكون الصيام سهلا، وكذلك نظام مخصص مرضى السكري.
3- يشمل أفضل الأعشاب الحارقة للدهون والتي تستخدم بانتظام مع النظام والحمية الغذائية المتبعة.
4- يشمل عداد السعرات الحرارية لحساب وحدات الطاقة في مختلف الأطعمة والمشروبات وهي بمثابة دليل شامل، وأحيانًا يرسل إشعارات منبه شرب الماء.
5- من أهم الأشياء التي يشملها دايت كلينيك هي النصائح اليومية وهي عن طريق تنبيهات تستقبلينها على هاتفك الجوال وبالطبع فهي مميزة جدًا وستفيدك في رجيمكِ.
6- به قسم خاص للتمارين الرياضية مثل تمرينات منزليه كارديو وغيرها وتشمل كذلك  البطن والكرش وغير ذلك من المناطق التي توجد بها دهون كثيرة وستساعدك بمشيئة الله في إنقاص الوزن الزائد سريعًا وتنشيف العضلات للاعبي كمال الأجسام.
7- أي استفسار تريدين إجابة سريعة له، يمكنكِ تركه في خانة الاستفسارات وستصلك إجابة عليه فورًا.

كما يقدم لكي تطبيقنا أفضل أنواع برامج الرجيم المختلفة صحي سريع المفعول منها ما هو يعد رجيم قاسي جدا لخسارة جزء من الوزن سريعًا في 7 أيام مثلا وحرق الدهون المتمركزة في مناطق مختلفة مثل الكرش او البطن - تخسيس الارداف والساقين، وأنظمة مختلفة رجيم مرضعات.

كذلك منها رجيم سهل يعمل على تنحيف الجسم على فترة أطول نسبيًا تصل لشهر أو شهرين ومنها رجيم الكربوهيدرات رجيم الماء رجيم البروتين وأيضًا رجيم النقاط بأنواعه المختلفة وكذلك رجيم قاراطاي رجيم كيميائي وكذلك الصيام المتقطع ورجيم السعرات الحرارية.

title: Paleo Diet Plan Beginner
description:
The Paleolithic diet, Paleo diet, caveman diet, or stone-age diet is a modern fad diet requiring the sole or predominant consumption of foods presumed to have been the only foods available to or consumed by humans during the Paleolithic era.

The digestive abilities of anatomically modern humans, however, are different from those of Paleolithic humans, which undermines the diet's core premise.During the 2.6-million-year-long Paleolithic era, the highly variable climate and worldwide spread of human populations meant that humans were, by necessity, nutritionally adaptable. Supporters of the diet mistakenly presuppose that human digestion has remained essentially unchanged over time.

While there is wide variability in the way the paleo diet is interpreted,the diet typically includes vegetables, fruits, nuts, roots, and meat and typically excludes foods such as dairy products, grains, sugar, legumes, processed oils, salt, alcohol or coffee.[1][additional citation(s) needed The diet is based on avoiding not just processed foods, but rather the foods that humans began eating after the Neolithic Revolution when humans transitioned from hunter-gatherer lifestyles to settled agriculture. The ideas behind the diet can be traced to Walter Voegtlin, and were popularized in the best-selling books of Loren Cordain.

Like other fad diets, the Paleo diet is promoted as a way of improving health.There is some evidence that following this diet may lead to improvements in terms of body composition and metabolic effects compared with the typical Western diet or compared with diets recommended by national nutritional guidelines.There is no good evidence, however, that the diet helps with weight loss, other than through the normal mechanisms of calorie restriction. Following the Paleo diet can lead to an inadequate calcium intake, and side effects can include weakness, diarrhea, and headaches.

More Feature;
# The Paleo Diet- A beginner's guide plus Meal Plan
# A Paleo Diet Meal Plan
# Foods to avoid
# Foods to eat
# Modified Paleo Diets

title: ক্যালরি ও ডায়েট
description:
এটি শরীরের বিএমআই, বিএমআর পরিমাপ করে ওজন সঠিক সীমা তে রাখার একটি বাংলা অ্যাপ যা ব্যবহার করা খুব সহজ। অ্যাপে শরীর কমানোর গুরুত্বপূর্ণ পরামর্শ পাওয়া যাবে। এছাড়াও এটি আপনার সুস্থতার পরিকল্পনা বানানো, দেহের সৌন্দর্য রক্ষা, কিভবে ডায়েট করতে হয় শেখা এবং খাদ্য ও শক্তি মূল্যায়ন করতে অনেক উপযোগী।

ডায়াবেটিস, হৃদরোগ, ভিটামিন এর অভাব, হাইপ্রেশার, হার্ট ব্লক, স্ট্রোক, ক্যান্সার এসব ভয়ংকর রোগের অন্যতম কারণ শরীরে চর্বি প্রয়োজনের অতিরিক্ত থাকা। তাই ডাক্তাররা সবসময় ভুঁড়ি বেশি না রাখাতে সতর্ক করেন। সহজেই দেহে অসুখ ধরা বা তনের দুর্বল ভাব, পেটে গ্যাস, দুশ্চিন্তা, অস্থিরতা, বদহজম, বমি-বমি ভাব, ঘুম কম হওয়া, উচ্চ রক্তচাপ, মাংসপেশিতে অত্যধিক ব্যাথা হওয়া, হাড় ক্ষয় ধরা ইত্যাদি সমস্যার মূল কারণ শরীরের ওজন স্বাভাবিক এর থেকে বেশ কম বা অনেক বেশী রাখা এবং শর্করা জাতীয় অখাদ্য বেশি খাওয়া। তাই ডায়েট করার সময় শ্বেতসার কম এবং আমিষ জাতীয় খাবার যেমনঃ মাছ, মাংস, ডিম ইত্যাদি বেশী খেতে বলা হয়।

আপনি মোটা কিনা জানুন স্বাস্থ্য ক্যালকুলেটর এর সাহায্যে। মেদ কত থেকে কতটুকু থাকতে হবে জেনে সুষম পুষ্টি সম্পন্ন খাদ্যদ্রব্য খেয়ে নিয়মিত হাটা সহ অন্যান্য ব্যায়াম করার লক্ষ্য স্থির করুন,

অ্যাপ টিতে দুইটি খাদ্য তালিকা (সাধারণ ও বিস্তারিত) যুক্ত আছে। এছাড়াও আহারে প্রয়োজনীয় খনিজ লবণ (যেমনঃ পটাশিয়াম যুক্ত খাবার) রাখতে হবে। শরীরে প্রোটিন এর আসল কাজ কী? কিভাবে সুস্বাদু খাবার রান্না করে ডায়েট করতে হয়? স্বাস্থ্যসম্মত উপায়ে বয়াম করলে কি হয়? প্রতি সময়ের খাবারে কত ক্যালোরি শক্তি থাকে? সেগুলোও জানতে হবে।

চার্ট দুইটি থেকে আপনার প্রতিদিনের পুষ্টিগুণ সম্মত আহার বেছে নিন। সুস্বাদু রান্নার প্রস্তুত প্রণালিগুলো ডায়েট রেসিপিতে যুক্ত করা আছে। এছাড়াও অ্যাপ এ রুপচর্চার অন্যান্য উপায় দেওয়া আছে যেখান থেকে মিল পরিকল্পনা করার প্রয়োজনীয় রুটিন নিজেই বানানো যাবে। অ্যাপটি শিশু, বৃদ্ধ, কিশোর, কিশোরি, ছেলে, মেয়ে অথবা প্রাপ্তবয়স্ক পুরুষ ও মহিলাদের জন্য সমান উপকারী।


শরীরের ওজনকে (কেজি) উচ্চতার বর্গ (মিটারে) দিয়ে ভাগ করে শরীর ভর সূচক হিসাব করা হয়। এই সূত্র থেকে দেহের গঠন আকৃতি ঠিক না থাকলে, সঠিক কত তা জানতে পারবেন।

বাসাল মেটাবলিক রেট বা বিএমার এর পরিমান দ্বারা দেহে সম্পূর্ণ বিশ্রাম অবস্থায় শক্তি চাহিদা কত ক্যালরি, তা জানা যায়।
এটি বের করতে আপনার বয়স, লিঙ্গ বা সেক্স , মিটারে উচ্চতা ও কেজিতে ওজন ৪টি-ই জানতে হবে।

নিজের কাছে সুস্বাস্থ্য পরামর্শক এপ টি ভালো ও উপকারী মনে হলে পরিবার ও বন্ধু দের সাথে শেয়ার করতে ও ৫ তারকা রিভিউ দিতে ভুলবেন।


 *আরোদ পাবেন
- কম ক্যালরির স্বাস্থ্যসম্মত ফাস্টফুড রেসিপি
- ঘরে বসে ওজন কমানোর উপায়
- ফ্যাট যাচাই ও দেহ কম করার অনুপ্রেরণা
- পানিচর্বির গোপন রহস্য ও কুফল
- পেট কমানোর প্রয়োজনীয়তা ও টিপস
- সহজ উপায়ে ডায়েট করে ওজন কমানো
- শরীর ও স্বাস্থ্য তথ্য সেবা মূলক এপ
- সুস্বাদু খাবার রেসিপি ও ডায়েট শুরু করার সহজ অ্যাপ	
- ওজন কমানোর ক্যালকুলেটর
- সহজে মেদ কমানোর ঘরোয়া টিপ্স
- পেটের সমস্যা সমাধান
- কোন রোগের কি ঔষধ ও চিকিৎসা
- কোন খাবারে কত ক্যালরি বা ভিটামিন
- টেনশন ফ্রী অনুশীলন
- ওজন বৃদ্ধি রোগের লক্ষণ
descriptionHTML:
এটি শরীরের বিএমআই, বিএমআর পরিমাপ করে ওজন সঠিক সীমা তে রাখার একটি বাংলা অ্যাপ যা ব্যবহার করা খুব সহজ। অ্যাপে শরীর কমানোর গুরুত্বপূর্ণ পরামর্শ পাওয়া যাবে। এছাড়াও এটি আপনার সুস্থতার পরিকল্পনা বানানো, দেহের সৌন্দর্য রক্ষা, কিভবে ডায়েট করতে হয় শেখা এবং খাদ্য ও শক্তি মূল্যায়ন করতে অনেক উপযোগী।

ডায়াবেটিস, হৃদরোগ, ভিটামিন এর অভাব, হাইপ্রেশার, হার্ট ব্লক, স্ট্রোক, ক্যান্সার এসব ভয়ংকর রোগের অন্যতম কারণ শরীরে চর্বি প্রয়োজনের অতিরিক্ত থাকা। তাই ডাক্তাররা সবসময় ভুঁড়ি বেশি না রাখাতে সতর্ক করেন। সহজেই দেহে অসুখ ধরা বা তনের দুর্বল ভাব, পেটে গ্যাস, দুশ্চিন্তা, অস্থিরতা, বদহজম, বমি-বমি ভাব, ঘুম কম হওয়া, উচ্চ রক্তচাপ, মাংসপেশিতে অত্যধিক ব্যাথা হওয়া, হাড় ক্ষয় ধরা ইত্যাদি সমস্যার মূল কারণ শরীরের ওজন স্বাভাবিক এর থেকে বেশ কম বা অনেক বেশী রাখা এবং শর্করা জাতীয় অখাদ্য বেশি খাওয়া। তাই ডায়েট করার সময় শ্বেতসার কম এবং আমিষ জাতীয় খাবার যেমনঃ মাছ, মাংস, ডিম ইত্যাদি বেশী খেতে বলা হয়।

আপনি মোটা কিনা জানুন স্বাস্থ্য ক্যালকুলেটর এর সাহায্যে। মেদ কত থেকে কতটুকু থাকতে হবে জেনে সুষম পুষ্টি সম্পন্ন খাদ্যদ্রব্য খেয়ে নিয়মিত হাটা সহ অন্যান্য ব্যায়াম করার লক্ষ্য স্থির করুন,

title: Diet plan for weight loss
description:
This app is designed to show you on how to go on diet and maintain body weight.maintaining body weight is very important in the human race because it helps the heart to be able to keep pumping blood for a good functionality of the body system.
Healthy eating is one of the best things you can do to prevent and control health problems such as heart disease, high blood pressure, type 2 diabetes, and some types of cancer.added exercises too helps maintain the body weight.

http://www.appsgeyser.com/privacy/app/?package_name=com.wDietplanforweightloss_11725286

title: Calorie Counter - Food & Diet Tracker
description:
What do you choose - weight loss or weight gain? Perhaps you’d like just to eat healthy and keep fit? No matter what your goal is it becomes our aim. Manage your diet, track your food calories with the calorie counter.

Perfect diet plan
★ There are lot’s of diet apps to control your weight. If you’re looking for simple but effective way to count calories we are ready to help! Calorie burn tracker and bmi calculator keeps track of the foods and drinks and their nutritional value quickly and easily. And the food and calorie journal shows the amount of meal you ate daily. 

Effective food calorie counter
★ How many calories do you eat and drink? Meal tracker with calorie counter provides the full info about eaten and burnt calories as well as carbs, protein and fat. Thanks to food tracker and daily calorie log you’ll stay aware of how much food you can afford with detailed estimation of calories left in calorie food list. 

Well-designed calories calculator
★ Graphs in burned calorie counter will keep you motivated to lose weight. They clearly demonstrate your progress on the way to health and fitness. Now you can track the progress towards you weight loss goals. 

 2 in 1: meal and water tracker
★ Do you know that to drink enough water is as essential as to check your nutrition, follow the diet or fitness. Set your drinking water goal in the water and calorie tracker and get the best result!

 Healthy recipes for healthy you
★ Spend much time thinking about preferable diet menu? Nothing to worry about any more with this food and calorie diary. The nutrition tracker offers you food recipes free. Be sure there are best low calorie food recipes to choose from in the food tracker app.

More about the food tracker for weight loss:

 Change your eating habits to the better ones!  Firstly all calories trackers seem to be just trackers but the more you use them the better experience of lose weight app you’ve got. How such weight loss apps and calorie counter work? When you see the direct reliance between nutrition and your weight, your motivation to lose weight upgrades proportionately.

Remember: to lose weight free and get better results firstly you’d check your bmi, use health and fitness apps together with meal tracker for weight loss if needed. This health fitness tracker with low calorie meal planner becomes your pal – the fitness app divides the success and keeps pushing you to improve the results.

title: Diet Mayo Panduan Lengkap
description:
Memiliki badan ideal merupakan dambaan bagi semua orang khususnya wanita. Banyak wanita yang mengeluhkan perutnya buncit, lengan yang bergelambir atau paha yang besar. Banyak wanita yang melakukan berbagai macam olahraga, menjaga makanan sampai dengan melakukan diet, salah satunya dengan diet mayo.

Pengertian Diet Mayo

Apa sih itu diet mayo? Diet mayo adalah program diet dengan cara tidak mengkonsumsi makanan atau pun minuman yang mengandung garam. Metode diet mayo ini sendiri disebut-sebut dapat menurunkan berat badan hingga 7 kg sampai 13 kg dalam kurun waktu 13 hari. Tetapi jika dalam kurun waktu 13 hari melanggar peraturan untuk tidak mengkonsumsi garam maka dinyatakan gagal dan harus mengulang dari awal.

Kenapa harus menghindari makanan atau minuman yang mengandung garam? Karena garam atau natrium mempunyai sifat osmosis atau menyerap air. Jadi jika dalam tubuh kita mengandung banyak garam, maka akan terjadi penumpukan cairan tubuh.

Cara Diet Mayo

Pada dasarnya diet mayo hanya tidak boleh mengkonsumsi makanan atau minuman yang mengandung garam dan juga air es, jadi perbanyak mengkonsumsi sayuran dan buah-buahan. Diet mayo ini tergolong mudah dan sederhana, hanya dengan mengatur pola makan kita selama 13 hari.

Menu Diet Mayo

Resep Diet Mayo Hari Pertama
Sarapan Pagi : disarankan meminum secangkir kopi atau teh dengan tambahan 1 sdt gula pasir ditambah dengan makan seporsi buah yang masih segar seperti apel.
Makan Siang : dengan seporsi salad dengan tambahan 1/4 daging ikan tuna, 2 wortel yang masih segar dipotong dadu , 4 sdm mayones serta 1 buah jeruk nipis yang diperas diatas salad tersebut.
Makan Malam : disarankan memakan lagi seporsi salad selada ditambah irisan 1 buah tomat, jamur dan bawang merah.

Menu Diet Mayo Hari Kedua
Sarapan Pagi : adalah dengan secangkir kopi atau teh dengan tambahan 1 sdt gula pasir.
Makan Siang : disarankan dengan mengkonsumsi 2 buah telur ayam yang telah direbus atau dimasak ditambah dengan sayur bayam dan juga buah tomat.
Makan Malam : dengan 100 gram bistik dengan selada dan tambahan jeruk nipis di atasnya.

Resep Diet Mayo Hari Ketiga
Sarapan Pagi : dengan mengkonsumsi 1 piece roti tawar ditemani secangkir kopi atau pun teh dengan 1 sdt gula pasir.
Makan Siang : disarankan dengan memakan 2 telur ayam yang telah direbus dengan 1 ikat bayam segar di tambakan 1 buah tomat.
Makan Malam : untuk diet mayo hari ketiga sama dengan menu makan malam diet mayo hari kedua. 100 gram bistik panggang dengan selada  dan diperas jeruk nipis di atasnya.

Menu Diet Mayo Hari Keempat
Sarapan Pagi : secangkir kopi atau teh dengan tambahan 1 sdt gula pasir dan 1 piece roti tawar.
Makan Siang : konsumsi 1 butir telur dan wortel yang telah direbus sebentar dengan selembar keju cheddar.
Makan Malam : cukup dengan semangkuk pepaya matang dan segelas susu rendah lemak tanpa gula.

Resep Diet Mayo Hari Kelima
Sarapan Pagi : dengan mengkonsumsi sebuah wortel yang masih mentah berukuran sedang dicuci lalu di parut dan ditambah perasan jeruk nipis.
Makan Siang : 120 gram daging ayam yang telah di kukus dengan tambahan sedikit saos yang tidak asin.
Makan Malam : konsumsilah 60 gram bistik pangang ditambah selada dan daun bayam sebagai pelengkapnya.

Menu Diet Mayo Hari Keenam
Sarapan Pagi : secangkir kopi atau teh tanpa gula pasir dan 1 piece roti tawar bakar.
Makan Siang : 120 gram daging ayam yang telah di kukus dengan tambahan sayur selada atau bayam.
Makan Malam : 2 butir telur ayam yang telah direbus dengan tambahan wortel mentah yang dipotong dadu.

Simak panduan lengkapnya di dalam aplikasi ini...

title: Atkins Diet Weight loss Plan 2019
description:
This Atkins Diet Weightloss Plan app provides information needed to get the best Atkins Diet program experience any where you go! The app also provide you the shopping list for your Atkins diet food supplies it is easy to follow by choosing and buying the right low carb food source and you will also have the chance to learn what food you should avoid to consume and what food you should eat. You can take a simple "1 Week Plan Atkins Diet Plan Challenge" in the Eat Right tab in the app to simply kick start your Atkins Diet Plan ahead.

Atkins Diet Weightloss Plan low carb diet program uses a powerful life-time approach to successful weight loss. Not everyone's body responds the same way to different approaches to losing weight. The key is to find a match for your body and metabolism. Atkins Diet Plan is also well-known for limiting the intake of sugar and carbohydrates. As a result, many people who follow this diet plan is successfully lost weight and kept it off – even though they had previously been unsuccessful on regular low-calorie diets!

The key was understanding that everyone's metabolism can use two different types of fuel for energy – either sugar (and carbs that are quickly turned into sugar by the body), or fat. But the type of fuel you burn can have a big difference in losing or maintaining weight. A typical diet reduces calories, but is still high in carbohydrates (and thus sugar). As a result, many people constantly cycle between sugar "highs" (where excess sugar is actually stored as fat in the body) and sugar "lows" (where you feel fatigued and ravenously hungry – for more carbs and sugar). For many, it's really hard to lose weight that way.

Atkins, on the other hand, limits carbohydrates (sugar), so the body burns fat, including body fat, for fuel. This approach leaves the body steadily fueled, and weight is lost, even when more calories are being consumed. Steady fueling also means more constant energy levels all day long, and less hunger and cravings!

The Atkins Diet Is a 4-Phase Plan and is split into 4 different phases:
- Phase 1 – Induction The Rules of Induction.
- Phase 2 – Ongoing Weight Loss.
- Phase 3 – Pre-maintenance.
- Phase 4 – Maintenance Keep an eye on your carb balance.

If counting calories hasn't worked for you in the past – try Atkins Diet Weight loss Plan – it may be the perfect approach for you!
